mapper.select: SELECT STDR_DT FROM IBIMS991B WHERE 1=1 AND HOLIDAY = 0 AND STDR_DT = #{stdrDt};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS999B SELECT A.BZ_DD AS BZ_DD , A.DD1AG_BZ_DD AS DD1AG_BZ_DD , A.DD2AG_BZ_DD AS DD2AG_BZ_DD , A.DD3AG_BZ_DD AS DD3AG_BZ_DD , A.DD1AF_BZ_DD AS DD1AF_BZ_DD , A.DD2AF_BZ_DD AS DD2AF_BZ_DD , A.DD3AF_BZ_DD AS DD3AF_BZ_DD FROM (SELECT STDR_DT AS BZ_DD , LEAD(STDR_DT, 1) OVER (ORDER BY STDR_DT DESC) AS DD1AG_BZ_DD , LEAD(STDR_DT, 2) OVER (ORDER BY STDR_DT DESC) AS DD2AG_BZ_DD , LEAD(STDR_DT, 3) OVER (ORDER BY STDR_DT DESC) AS DD3AG_BZ_DD , LAG(STDR_DT, 1) OVER (ORDER BY STDR_DT DESC) AS DD1AF_BZ_DD , LAG(STDR_DT, 2) OVER (ORDER BY STDR_DT DESC) AS DD2AF_BZ_DD , LAG(STDR_DT, 3) OVER (ORDER BY STDR_DT DESC) AS DD3AF_BZ_DD FROM IBIMS991B WHERE 1=1 AND HOLIDAY = '0' AND BSS_DT BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{bzDd}, 'YYYYMMDD'), -1 ) AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{bzDd}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1 ) ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BZ_DD = #{bzDd};
